headline.main: Rockies Down Cubs 5-1, Off to First 4-0 Start Since '95
headline.print_headline: Rockies Down Cubs 5-1, Off to First 4-0 Start Since '95

docs.snippet: It's not the wins but the way they're winning that gives the Colorado Rockies faith this season can be different....
docs.lead_paragraph: It's not the wins but the way they're winning that gives the Colorado Rockies faith this season can be different.

headline.main: Kansas Imam: Man Accused of Bomb Plot Had Mental Problems
headline.print_headline: Kansas Imam: Man Accused of Bomb Plot Had Mental Problems

docs.snippet: The imam of a Topeka mosque says a 20-year-old man accused of planning a suicide attack at Fort Riley was mentally ill and was brought to the mosque by the Federal Bureau of Investigation for counseling....
docs.lead_paragraph: The imam of a Topeka mosque says a 20-year-old man accused of planning a suicide attack at Fort Riley was mentally ill and was brought to the mosque by the Federal Bureau of Investigation for counseling.

headline.main: Hot Hoffman Left in Shade by Rampaging Spieth
headline.print_headline: Hot Hoffman Left in Shade by Rampaging Spieth

docs.snippet: In many years, Charley Hoffman would be the runaway midway leader of the Masters and the talk of Augusta National after carding a solid four-under 68 on Friday....

headline.main: Monkey Deaths Prompt Investigation of Harvard Primate Center
headline.print_headline: Monkey Deaths Prompt Investigation of Harvard Primate Center

docs.snippet: The U.S. Department of Agriculture is investigating the New England Primate Research Center run by Harvard Medical School in Massachusetts in response to the deaths of six monkeys at the Oregon Zoo last year, shortly after they arrived from the ce...
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Department of Agriculture is investigating the New England Primate Research Center run by Harvard Medical School in Massachusetts in response to the deaths of six monkeys at the Oregon Zoo last year, shortly after they arrived from the center.

headline.main: Astros Beat Ailing Rangers in Home Debut of Texas Manager
headline.print_headline: Astros Beat Ailing Rangers in Home Debut of Texas Manager

docs.snippet: Collin McHugh picked up where he left off as a rookie pitcher for the Houston Astros, who finally put together some offense as well....

headline.main: Missouri Health Care Navigator Law Pre-empted, Court Rules
headline.print_headline: Missouri Health Care Navigator Law Pre-empted, Court Rules

docs.snippet: An appeals court ruled Friday that Missouri can't limit health insurance navigators' ability to help people obtain insurance under President Barack Obama's health care law — a ruling that advocates say could have implications for other state...
docs.lead_paragraph: An appeals court ruled Friday that Missouri can't limit health insurance navigators' ability to help people obtain insurance under President Barack Obama's health care law — a ruling that advocates say could have implications for other states that have instituted similar restrictions.

headline.main: Former Ambassador: Early Idea to Invite Kim to US Rejected
headline.print_headline: Former Ambassador: Early Idea to Invite Kim to US Rejected

docs.snippet: A former ambassador to South Korea says he once suggested that Kim Jong Un be invited to the United States for an "orientation trip" when Kim's father still led North Korea, but the idea was rejected — which he calls a mistake....
docs.lead_paragraph: A former ambassador to South Korea says he once suggested that Kim Jong Un be invited to the United States for an "orientation trip" when Kim's father still led North Korea, but the idea was rejected — which he calls a mistake.

headline.main: T. Boone Pickens Shows Up at Oklahoma St Scrimmage
